## FmaNode class

Fused multiply-add operation

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class FmaNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns a \* b + c in a single operation. More accurate and potentially faster than separate multiply and add. All three inputs must be the same type (float, vec2, vec3, or vec4). Component-wise for vectors.
